title: Trump Media Is a Loser in a Year of Winners: Matthew Winkler
description: Bloomberg News Editor-in-Chief Emeritus Matt Winkler joins Bloomberg Businessweek Daily to discuss his latest column detailing how President Donald Trump's publicly traded media and technology company performed in 2025. The venture, which goes by the ticker "DJT" and whose primary asset is the Truth Social platform, has managed to generate just $3.7 million in revenue over the 12 months ended Sept. 30 while posting an operating loss of $186.1 million. Winkler also discusses Trump Media & Technology Corp. Group's latest venture: a merger with nuclear fusion developer TAE Technologies Inc. Winkler speaks with Alexis Christoforous and Isabelle Lee. (Source: Bloomberg)
